comment.body:
I like emcas much, but I ended some day on vim due to the fact that at least vi is in every Linux system included.
Vim is my standard editor for everything, even for the blog posts.

@caryoscelus: emacs and vim have both very special commands and if you don't use them regularly you always search for the right commmands.
You landed at emacs, I at vim. Both are very very good editors.
I work more in the terminal than using kate or gedit. I try to avoid the mouse for more convenience while writing and typing. It is just faster for me.
For editing code with a gui I can recommended Geany as a very good editor.
